post:
We have released 2 new dark themes for Blesta!

Odin Hosting Template - Odin - Blesta Dark Theme - AALayer Marketplace - Only 59$.

Zeus Hosting Template - Zeus - Blesta Dark Theme - AALayer Marketplace - Only 59$.

What you will get:

  • An unique and modern hosting theme
  • 3 folders, HTML Theme + Blesta Theme + Blesta CMS Pro Theme
  • 1 year free support

Apply the code HT10 for a more 10% discount while purchasing.
